W
ithout such evidence being led to prove the fact that the decree was in fact
not served on the petitioner, the fiscal report cannot be disregarded.  In this
case, the decree has been served at two places.

F
urthermore,  the  petitioner  has  failed  to  plead  exceptional  circumstances
that warrant the invocation of the extraordinary jurisdiction of  Restitutio-in-
Integrum.    The  petitioner  failed  to  disclose  the  fact  that  the  petitioner  had
filed a notice of appeal in the District Court, to appeal to the Civil Appellate
High Court of Mt. Lavinia against the decree absolute in PR/11/2023.

T
